name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth, warmed
steps:
Heat broth in a saucepan and keep it warm over low heat.
Heat olive oil and 1 tablespoon butter in a large pan over medium heat.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5-6 minutes until golden brown. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add remaining butter and diced onion. Saut√© for 3-4 minutes until translucent.
Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add arborio rice and stir for 2 minutes until rice is slightly toasted.
Pour in white wine and stir until mostly absorbed.
Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly and waiting for each addition to be absorbed before adding the next.
Continue this process for 18-20 minutes until rice is creamy and al dente.
Stir in cooked mushrooms, parmesan cheese, and parsley.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately while hot and creamy.
